00020 typedef struct tagSlidingItem {
00021         CodingPictInfo pictInfo;
00022         SliceParameters sp;
00023 } SlidingItem;
00024 
00025 class SlidingWindow
00026 {

00029         int _height;
00030         int _viewCount;
00031         int _refWidth;

00033         int _slidingFrameCount;
00034         int _slidingWindowSizeM1;
00035         SlidingItem *_slidingWindow;
00036         int _firstUnfinished;
00037         int _firstAvail;
00038         int _keep;
00039         int _lastUnsaved;
00040         bool _dataFinished;

00042         void AllocMem(CodingPictInfo &info)
00043         {
00044                 info.Size_Height = _height;
00045                 info.Size_Width = _width;
00046                 info.lumaStart = (uint8_t*)getMemAligned(_width * _height);
00047                 info.chromaUStart = (uint8_t*)getMemAligned(_width * _height / 4);
00048                 info.chromaVStart = (uint8_t*)getMemAligned(_width * _height / 4);
00049                 info.refVec = (uint8_t *)getMemAligned(_width/4 * _height/4 * sizeof(refVector) * 2);
00050                 info.resultStream = (uint8_t*)getMemAligned(50000);
00051                 info.resultSize = (int32_t*)getMemAligned(4);
00052                 info.pictStatus = PICT_STATUS_WAIT;
00053                 //info.refVec = (uint8_t*)getMemAligned(_width * _height / 8);
00054         }
00055 
00056         int GetFirstUnmarked(int mark, int first, int last)
00057         {
00058                 int offset = (first * _viewCount) & _slidingWindowSizeM1;
00059                 while (first < last)
00060                 {
00061                         bool ok = true;
00062                         for (int i = 0; i < _viewCount; ++i)
00063                         {
00064                                 if (!(_slidingWindow[offset].pictInfo.pictStatus&mark))
00065                                 {
00066                                         ok = false;
00067                                         break;
00068                                 }
00069                                 offset = (offset + 1) & _slidingWindowSizeM1;
00070                         }
00071                         if (!ok)
00072                                 break;
00073                         ++first;
00074                 }
00075                 return first;
00076         }

00080         SlidingWindow()
00081                 : _slidingFrameCount(0), _width(0), _height(0), _viewCount(0), _refWidth(0), _dataFinished(false)
00082         {
00083                 _firstUnfinished = 0;
00084                 _firstAvail = 0;
00085                 _keep = 0;
00086                 _lastUnsaved = 0;
00087         }
00088 
00089         SlidingWindow(int width, int height, int viewCount, int refWidth, int slidingFrameCount)
00090                 : _slidingFrameCount(0), _width(0), _height(0), _viewCount(0), _refWidth(0), _dataFinished(false)
00091         {
00092                 Init(width, height, viewCount, refWidth, slidingFrameCount);
00093                 _firstUnfinished = 0;
00094                 _firstAvail = 0;
00095                 _keep = 0;
00096                 _lastUnsaved = 0;
00097         }
00098 
00099         void Init(int width, int height, int viewCount, int refWidth, int slidingFrameCount)
00100         {
00101                 refWidth = refWidth * 2;
00102                 slidingFrameCount = refWidth * 2;
00103                 _slidingFrameCount = slidingFrameCount;
00104                 _width = width;
00105                 _height = height;
00106                 _viewCount = viewCount;
00107                 _refWidth = refWidth;
00108                 int slidingWindowSize = _viewCount * slidingFrameCount;
00109                 ++slidingWindowSize;
00110                 while (slidingWindowSize & (slidingWindowSize - 1))
00111                         slidingWindowSize = (slidingWindowSize | (slidingWindowSize - 1)) + 1;
00112                 printf("slidingWindowSize = %d\n", slidingWindowSize);
00113                 _slidingWindow = new SlidingItem[slidingWindowSize];
00114                 for (int i = 0; i < slidingWindowSize; ++i)
00115                         AllocMem(_slidingWindow[i].pictInfo);
00116                 _slidingWindowSizeM1 = slidingWindowSize - 1;
00117         }
00118 
00119         int GetFirstAvail() const
00120         {
00121                 return _firstAvail;
00122         }
00123 
00124         void IncreaseAvail()
00125         {
00126                 _firstAvail = GetFirstUnmarked(PICT_STATUS_AVAIL, _firstAvail, GetUnsaved() + _slidingFrameCount);
00127         }
00128 
00129         int GetUnsaved()
00130         {
00131                 IncreaseSaved();
00132                 return _lastUnsaved;
00133         }
00134 
00135         void IncreaseSaved()
00136         {
00137                 int lastUnsaved = GetFirstUnmarked(PICT_STATUS_SAVED, _lastUnsaved, GetKeep());
00138                 int offset = (_lastUnsaved * _viewCount) & _slidingWindowSizeM1;
00139                 for (int i = _lastUnsaved; i < lastUnsaved; ++i)
00140                 {
00141                         for (int j = 0; j < _viewCount; ++j)
00142                         {
00143                                 _slidingWindow[offset].pictInfo.pictStatus = PICT_STATUS_WAIT;
00144                                 offset = (offset + 1) & _slidingWindowSizeM1;
00145                         }
00146                 }
00147                 _lastUnsaved = lastUnsaved;
00148         }
00149 
00150         int GetKeep()
00151         {
00152                 if (_dataFinished && (_firstUnfinished == _firstAvail))
00153                         _keep = _firstUnfinished;
00154                 return _keep;
00155         }
00156 
00157         void IncreaseKeep()
00158         {
00159                 ++_keep;
00160         }
00161 
00162         int GetFirstUnfinished()
00163         {
00164                 return _firstUnfinished;
00165         }
00166 
00167         void IncreaseFinish()
00168         {
00169                 _firstUnfinished = GetFirstUnmarked(PICT_STATUS_FINISHED, _firstUnfinished, _firstAvail);
00170                 if (_dataFinished && (_firstUnfinished == _firstAvail))
00171                         _keep = _firstUnfinished;
00172                 else if (_firstUnfinished - _keep > _refWidth)
00173                         _keep = _firstUnfinished - _refWidth;
00174         }
00175 
00176         void InitPictInfo(int timeId, int viewId)
00177         {
00178                 CodingPictInfo &info = *GetCodingPictInfo(timeId, viewId);
00179                 info.timeId = timeId;
00180                 info.viewId = viewId;
00181                 info.pictStatus = PICT_STATUS_WAIT;
00182         }
00183 
00184         CodingPictInfo *GetCodingPictInfo(int timeId, int viewId)
00185         {
00186                 if (timeId - GetUnsaved() >= _slidingFrameCount)
00187                         return 0;
00188                 int offset = (timeId * _viewCount + viewId) & _slidingWindowSizeM1;
00189                 return &(_slidingWindow[offset].pictInfo);
00190         }
00191 
00192         SliceParameters *GetSliceParameters(int timeId, int viewId)
00193         {
00194                 if (timeId - GetUnsaved() >= _slidingFrameCount)
00195                         return 0;
00196                 int offset = (timeId * _viewCount + viewId) & _slidingWindowSizeM1;
00197                 return &(_slidingWindow[offset].sp);
00198         }
00199 
00200         bool IsDataFinished() const 
00201         {
00202                 return _dataFinished;
00203         }
00204 
00205         void SetDataFinished()
00206         {
00207                 _dataFinished = true;
00208         }
00209 };
